title: Application Development Bootcamp Week II: Designing efficient Data Model
description:
Please find below links that could be useful to you during the session (expand)ðŸ‘‡

This session looks at how to effectively design a data model for your full-stack application because it's essential for a highly-performant application. Youâ€™ll leave knowing how to create data models that scale effectively as your system grows - meaning your users get the experience they deserve! From this session, you can expect to:

- Get hands-on experience with Cassandra Query Language (CQL) on your own cluster
- Learn how to model your data to your queries
- Put all this into practice and work through an example application data model
